description: Ask your questions and be informed
title: Join U-Report Zimbabwe text join to 33500
content:
- Got more questions on tough issues? Submit your queries to U-Report by texting “join"  to 33500. And get your question answered!

- U-report is a free SMS social monitoring tool for community participation, designed to address issues that the population cares about.

**Related Info:** 33500 free on all mobile networks
